title: Brazil : voting intention for 2018 presidential elections , by candidate
summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing SOME LABEL on the Y-axis throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B on the X-axis.
Over the 30 Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have been declined whereas risen for Month.
In Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT), Situation A had the highest SOME LABEL 39.0 among the 2 groups and in Don't know, Situation A had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
In Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT), Situation A had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Month Don't know out of all 30 Months.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents SOME LABEL on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B.
All through the Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have declined. On the other hand, for Month the SOME LABEL have risen.
mid_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing SOME LABEL on the Y-axis throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B on the X-axis.
Over the 30 Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have been declined whereas risen for Month.
In Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT), Situation A had the highest SOME LABEL 39.0 among the 2 groups and in Don't know, Situation A had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.

max_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing SOME LABEL on the Y-axis throughout 30 Months for Situation A, and Situation B on the X-axis.
All through the Months, the SOME LABEL for Situation A have declined. On the other hand, for Month the SOME LABEL have risen.
Out of all 2 groups, Situation A had the highest SOME LABEL in Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) and Situation A had the lowest SOME LABEL in Month Don't know.
Among all the Months, Situation A had the highest SOME LABEL 39.0 in Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) and lowest value 0.0 in Month Don't know.
The maximum SOME LABEL for Situation A that was found in Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) was 39.0 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Month Don't know.
Among the groups, Situation A had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 39.0 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.
Averaging all 2 groups Situation A, and Situation B, the Month Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) is the maximum SOME LABEL and João Goulart Filho (PPL) is the minimum SOME LABEL.

data.Month: Blank or voided ballots / No vote
